content: november mini mystery cal little football crochet pattern november mini by sara sach thank you for purchasing a posh pooch designs dog clothes original pattern i have done my best to keep my patterns simple and easy to understand if at any time you need assistance please feel free to contact me at the email below please remember that there may be a slight variance in sizing due to different tensions of each individual and materials used all patterns are copyright protected whether free or paid this includes all photography you are welcome to sell finished products made from my patterns i do ask however that you mention my company name i would love to see your finished products if you would like to send me pictures these will be for my personal use only and will not be posted anywhere without prior written permission from you enjoy sara sach ssach@poshpoochdesigns com 1 november mini mystery cal - little football crochet pattern november mini supplies crochet hook h / 5 mm yarn med 4 acrylic c1- brown or color of choice - 5 oz c2 white small amount yarn needle stitch marker stuffing poly fiberfil stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet change to chgto single_crochet together sctog size 7 inches notes this pattern is stitched in the round 2 pattern r 1- ch2 6 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook mark the last st of each row with the stitch marker 6sc r 2 single_crochet in the 1st single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet repeat around 9sc r 3 single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet repeat around 12sc r 4 single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet repeat around 3 15sc r 5 - single_crochet in the next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet repeat around 18sc 3 r 6 - single_crochet in the next 5 sc5 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet repeat around 21sc r 7 single_crochet in the next 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet repeat around 24sc r 8 - chgto c2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24sc r 9 - single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24sc r 10 chgto c1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 r 11 r 16 - single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 4 r 17 chgto c2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 r 18 - single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 r 19 chgto c1 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24sc stuff about half full 5 r 20 - 1 single_crochet next 6 single_crochet sctog the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * to * 21 single_crochet r 21 - 1 single_crochet next 5 single_crochet sctog the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * to * 18 single_crochet r 22 - single_crochet in the next 4sc decrease the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 15sc stuff the football r 23 - single_crochet in the next 3 single_crochet 2 decrease the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 12sc
